name: stark-srcs
description: Stark - a framework for Angular apps
author: Stark Team <sebastien.dubois@nbb.be>

scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:stark-build && npm run clean:stark-core && npm run clean:stark-testing && npm run clean:starter
scripts.clean:stark-build: cd packages/stark-build && npm run clean && cd ../..
scripts.clean:stark-core: cd packages/stark-core && npm run clean && cd ../..
scripts.clean:stark-testing: cd packages/stark-testing && npm run clean && cd ../..
scripts.clean:starter: cd starter && npx rimraf ./dist && npx rimraf ./node_modules/@nationalbankbelgium && cd ..
scripts.clean:modules:all: npm run clean:modules && npm run clean:modules:stark-build && npm run clean:modules:stark-core && npm run clean:modules:stark-testing && npm run clean:modules:starter
scripts.clean:modules:stark-build: cd packages/stark-build && npm run clean:modules && cd ../..
scripts.clean:modules:stark-core: cd packages/stark-core && npm run clean:modules && cd ../..
scripts.clean:modules:stark-testing: cd packages/stark-testing && npm run clean:modules dist && cd ../..
scripts.clean:modules:starter: cd starter && npm run clean:modules dist && cd ..
scripts.lint:stark-core: cd packages/stark-core && npm run lint && cd ../..
scripts.lint:starter: cd starter && npm run lint && cd ..
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && npm run lint:stark-core && npm run lint:starter
scripts.install:all: npm run install:stark-build && npm run install:stark-testing && npm run install:stark-core && npm run build && npm run update:starter
scripts.install:ci:all: npm run install:ci:stark-build && npm run install:ci:stark-testing && npm run install:ci:stark-core && npm run build:trace && npm run install:ci:starter
scripts.install:travis:all: npm run install:stark-build && npm run install:stark-testing && npm run install:stark-core && npm run build:trace && npm run update:starter
scripts.test:stark-core: cd packages/stark-core && npm run test-fast && cd ../..
scripts.test:starter: cd starter && npm run test-fast && cd ../..
scripts.test:all: npm run test:stark-core && npm run test:starter
scripts.test:ci:stark-core: cd packages/stark-core && npm run test-fast:ci && cd ../..
scripts.test:ci:starter: cd starter && npm run test-fast:ci && cd ../..
scripts.test:ci:all: npm run test:ci:stark-core && npm run test:ci:starter
